trans-unit.source: 1) Create a blank robots.txt file in your root directory.
trans-unit.target: 1) Create a blank robots.txt file in your root directory.

trans-unit.source: 2) Give it write permissions (CHMOD 666 on Unix system).
trans-unit.target: 2) Give it write permissions (CHMOD 666 on Unix system).

trans-unit.source: Aliases and results are both required.
trans-unit.target: Aliases and results are both required.

trans-unit.source: All keywords must be separated
trans-unit.target: All keywords must be separated

trans-unit.source: All mandatory keywords (*) must be included in the route
trans-unit.target: All mandatory keywords (*) must be included in the route

trans-unit.source: An address located in a country containing states must have a state selected.
trans-unit.target: An address located in a country containing states must have a state selected.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while updating this group.
trans-unit.target: An error occurred while updating this group.

trans-unit.source: An order status with the same name already exists: %s
trans-unit.target: An order status with the same name already exists: %s

trans-unit.source: As long as a keyword has an associated value, you can use the syntax {prepend:keyword:append} to add text before and after it.
trans-unit.target: As long as a keyword has an associated value, you can use the syntax {prepend:keyword:append} to add text before and after it.

trans-unit.source: Assign a valid page if you want it to be read.
trans-unit.target: Assign a valid page if you want it to be read.

trans-unit.source: Before being able to use this tool, you need to:
trans-unit.target: Before being able to use this tool, you need to:

trans-unit.source: Before making any changes to the default pattern of your URLs, make sure to meet the following requirements:
trans-unit.target: Before making any changes to the default pattern of your URLs, make sure to meet the following requirements:

trans-unit.source: Before you can use this tool, you need to:
trans-unit.target: Before you can use this tool, you need to:

trans-unit.source: Caution: The discount applied to a category does not stack with the overall reduction but instead replaces it.
trans-unit.target: Caution: The discount applied to a category does not stack with the overall reduction but instead replaces it.

trans-unit.source: Click here to set a URL for this shop.
trans-unit.target: Click here to set a URL for this shop.

trans-unit.source: Create a blank .htaccess in your root directory.
trans-unit.target: Create a blank .htaccess in your root directory.

trans-unit.source: Generate your "robots.txt" file by clicking on the following button (this will erase the old robots.txt file)
trans-unit.target: Generate your "robots.txt" file by clicking on the following button (this will erase the old robots.txt file)

trans-unit.source: Give it write permissions (CHMOD 666 on Unix system).
trans-unit.target: Give it write permissions (CHMOD 666 on Unix system).

trans-unit.source: Here you can set the URL for your shop. If you migrate your shop to a new URL, remember to change the values below.
trans-unit.target: Here you can set the URL for your shop. If you migrate your shop to a new URL, remember to change the values below.

trans-unit.source: Is not a valid alias
trans-unit.target: Is not a valid alias

trans-unit.source: Is not a valid result
trans-unit.target: Is not a valid result

trans-unit.source: Keywords must be in braces {keyword}
trans-unit.target: Keywords must be in braces {keyword}

trans-unit.source: Latitude and longitude are required.
trans-unit.target: Latitude and longitude are required.

trans-unit.source: Only available keywords for a given route can be used
trans-unit.target: Only available keywords for a given route can be used

trans-unit.source: Only products that have this category as the default category will be affected.
trans-unit.target: Only products that have this category as the default category will be affected.

trans-unit.source: Please create some sub-categories for this root category.
trans-unit.target: Please create some sub-categories for this root category.

trans-unit.source: The Base URI is not valid.
trans-unit.target: The Base URI is not valid.

trans-unit.source: The Friendly URL feature must be enabled
trans-unit.target: The Friendly URL feature must be enabled

trans-unit.source: The discount value is incorrect (must be a percentage).
trans-unit.target: The discount value is incorrect (must be a percentage).

trans-unit.source: The discount value is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: The discount value is incorrect.

trans-unit.source: The multistore option is enabled. If you want to change the URL of your shop, you must go to the "Multistore" page under the "Advanced Parameters" menu.
trans-unit.target: The multistore option is enabled. If you want to change the URL of your shop, you must go to the "Multistore" page under the "Advanced Parameters" menu.

trans-unit.source: The specified state is not located in this country.
trans-unit.target: The specified state is not located in this country.

trans-unit.source: There are several available keywords for each route listed below; note that keywords with * are required!
trans-unit.target: There are several available keywords for each route listed below; note that keywords with * are required!

trans-unit.source: This is not a valid IP address:
trans-unit.target: This is not a valid IP address:

trans-unit.source: This section enables you to change the default pattern of your links. In order to use this functionality, PrestaShop's "Friendly URL" option must be enabled, and Apache's URL rewriting module (mod_rewrite) must be activated on your web server.
trans-unit.target: This section enables you to change the default pattern of your links. In order to use this functionality, PrestaShop's "Friendly URL" option must be enabled, and Apache's URL rewriting module (mod_rewrite) must be activated on your web server.

trans-unit.source: To add a keyword in your URL, use the {keyword} syntax. If the keyword is not empty, you can add text before or after the keyword with syntax {prepend:keyword:append}. For example {-hey-:meta_title} will add "-hey-my-title" in the URL if the meta title is set.
trans-unit.target: To add a keyword in your URL, use the {keyword} syntax. If the keyword is not empty, you can add text before or after the keyword with syntax {prepend:keyword:append}. For example {-hey-:meta_title} will add "-hey-my-title" in the URL if the meta title is set.

trans-unit.source: URL rewriting must be activated on your web server
trans-unit.target: URL rewriting must be activated on your web server

trans-unit.source: Warning: You won't be able to change the group of this shop if this shop belongs to a group with one of these options activated: Share Customers, Share Quantities or Share Orders.
trans-unit.target: Warning: You won't be able to change the group of this store if it belongs to a group with one of these options activated: Share Customers, Share Quantities or Share Orders.

trans-unit.source: Wrong category ID.
trans-unit.target: Wrong category ID.

trans-unit.source: You can only display the page list in a shop context.
trans-unit.target: You can only display the page list in a shop context.

trans-unit.source: You can only move your shop to a shop group with all "share" options disabled -- or to a shop group with no customers/orders.
trans-unit.target: You can only move your store to a store group with all "share" options disabled -- or to a store group with no customers/orders.

trans-unit.source: You cannot delete this shop (customer and/or order dependency)
trans-unit.target: You cannot delete this shop (customer and/or order dependency)

trans-unit.source: You cannot delete this shop (customer and/or order dependency).
trans-unit.target: You cannot delete this shop (customer and/or order dependency).

trans-unit.source: You cannot save group reductions.
trans-unit.target: You cannot save group reductions.

trans-unit.source: You must define an SMTP server and an SMTP port. If you do not know it, use the PHP mail() function instead.
trans-unit.target: You must define an SMTP server and an SMTP port. If you do not know it, use the PHP mail() function instead.

trans-unit.source: You need to select at least the root category.
trans-unit.target: You need to select at least the root category.

trans-unit.source: You should also comply with the syntax:
trans-unit.target: You should also comply with the syntax:

trans-unit.source: Your robots.txt file MUST be in your website's root directory and nowhere else (e.g. http://www.example.com/robots.txt).
trans-unit.target: Your robots.txt file MUST be in your website's root directory and nowhere else (e.g. http://www.example.com/robots.txt).
